thing-type.label: IM-20 Door/Window Sensor
thing-type.description: Door/Window Sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtBattery powered door/window sensor.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTo include the sensor in a networks start by placing the controller in inclusion mode. Then activate the inclusion mode at the sensor by pressing the tamper switch 3 times within 1.5s.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTo exclude the sensor in a networks start by placing the controller in exclusion mode. Then activate the exclusion mode at the sensor by pressing the tamper switch 3 times within 1.5s.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<ul&gt<li&gtManual Wake-up<br /&gtQuickly press tamper switch once, the door sensor will automatically send wake-up information, and there will be 10s after wake-up to receive gateway setting information.</li&gt <li&gtAutomatic Wake-up<br /&gtDefault time of automatic wake-up is 24 hours, and there will be 10s after wake-up to receive gateway setting information, the max automatic report time = 24 hours, minimum=30min</li&gt </ul&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Basic Set Level
parameter.description: Basic Set Command will be sent when the door/window is opened or closed<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtIf there is any device under Association Group2, the door sensor will send “Basic Set = value” command to control that device when the door sensor is opened.<br /&gt“Value” configuration rule is as below:<br /&gtAvailable settings:</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gt1 to 100 Dimmer Level</li&gt <li&gt255 (Default) For ON/OFF Light Only</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Turn Off Light Time Configuration
parameter.description: Turn Off Light Time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtIf there is any device under Association Group2, the door sensor will send “Basic Set = value”<br /&gtcommand to Group2, and send “Basic Set = 0x00” command to turn-off light after “t” seconds,<br /&gtSet value = “t”, means to send Basic Set command after “t” seconds.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Door Sensor Status Report
parameter.description: Auto report Door/Window status time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtUnder normal working status (without trigger), the door sensor will automatically send report<br /&gtto the Gateway about its current tamper &amp; open/close status. Set value = t, means “t” hours,<br /&gt(“t”=0, means no status report)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: group_1
parameter.label: 1: Lifeline
parameter.description: Is assigned to the device status - OPEN/CLOSED.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt1.It will send “NOTIFICATION_REPORT”to the device in Group 1 when the door sensor is opened / closed, tamper switch is triggered / recovered.</p&gt <p&gt2.When in low battery status, door sensor will send “BATTERY_REPORT” to Group 1 device periodically.</p&gt <p&gt3.The door sensor will send “DEVICE_RESET_LOCALLY_NOTIFICATION” to Group1 device when the device recovers to factory settings.</p&gt

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: 2: Group 2
parameter.description: Sending control commands to associated devices<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtWhen the door sensor is opened, it will send “BASIC SET” command to control these devices in Group2.</p&gt
